original_text: Johanan became the father of Azariah. Azariah served God as a priest in the temple that Solomon built in Jerusalem.
korean_text: 요하난은 아사랴를 낳았으니 이 아사랴는 솔로몬이 예루살렘에 세운 성전에서 제사장의 직분을 행한 자이며

sentences.original_text: Johanan became the father of Azariah
Azariah served God as a priest
in the temple that Solomon built
